text: Staff were very knowledgeable, were able to answer all my questions, willing to listen and help. Cover itself is awesome, takes care of everything I need it to, its flexible, can be built to fit your needs and most importantly there arenâ€™t a whole lot of stupid restrictions that seem to be part and parcel of other companies products. Best of all, this all comes at a very reasonable price!
